description: Create a broker retainer payment forecast.
permissions: User must be an admin or have a broker membership for the broker being forecast.
side_effects: Computes a forecast schedule of upcoming retainer payments for the broker.
validation_notes: --broker is required and must reference an existing broker; the server validates broker presence. --date must be a valid date string and is parsed by the server (expected YYYY-MM-DD); if omitted, the server defaults the date to today. schedule is server-generated and cannot be set on create.
